entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
